name: Troll Face Quest USA Adventure
description:
Is there room in your schedule to try out some really tricky and very cool puzzles? If so, then put up a Do Not Disturb sign and play this brand new point and click adventure game. It’ll help you escape boredom like no other game out there...but it could make you feel like a potato head!

This American-themed version of Troll Face Quest, the acclaimed point and click adventure series, is here to make you LOL and test the very limits of your brain. It’s as tough as any quiz game, but much more funny!

Show us how brainy you are and prove that you’re no potato head! You’ll get to challenge yourself with brand new puzzles. Not everybody will be able to handle them! They’re almost as difficult as an impossible quiz!

Escape boredom with this thrilling point and click adventure game that will take you on a journey through many of America’s most legendary tales. It’s a lot more fun and hilarious than an impossible quiz you’d take in a history class.

That’s right, it’s adventure time, but will you be fooled by this collection of pranks? Use your detective skills to avoid getting tricked, even if that might seem impossible. Are you clever enough to make it all the way through this epic point and click quest while you escape from each totally wild level?

Troll Face Quest: USA Adventure is the only game where you can solve puzzles that involve both American presidents and indestructible superheroes! As always, if it exists, we can mock it! Do you think that's impossible? Don’t take our word for it! Play the game and find out for yourself!

Point and click your way through new adventures involving baseball, football, boxing, and so much more! Will you drop the ball and disturb your brain? Or will you relax while you use your detective skills to solve all of the puzzles in this ultra exciting but very tricky game?

Are you a die-hard fan of American movies? If so, make room for lots of new levels of fun along with some amazing stories that will tease, prank, and trick you! A quick word of warning, though: a few of them might make you feel like a total potato head!

Dive into a world filled with Hollywood stories and legendary events from American history, but don’t worry. This isn’t an impossible quiz that will test your ability to remember all that boring stuff you learned in the classroom. Oh, and definitely let us know if we managed to prank you with our new levels and tricky puzzles!


Fab Features:
- Experience totally crazy and funny puzzles that will make you LOL!
- Solve hilariously illogical puzzles and go on crazy quests! It’s adventure time!
- Meet (and occasionally disturb) delirious, legendary, and wacky characters who are all a bit edgy and really cool!
- Dive into unexpectedly hilarious situations!
- Discover truly one-of-a-kind graphics.
- Play anytime and anywhere. No Wi-Fi needed!
- Fully-enabled leaderboards and achievements. Show off your skills!

Are you great at quiz games? Do you think you have what it takes to solve all the tricky puzzles in this one? Test your brain power and prove that you’ve got some really impressive detective skills. Play Troll Face Quest: USA Adventure today if you’re looking for a real challenge! Even potato heads will love it!
